titleStmt.title: The collection of the historie of England. By S.D.
titleStmt.author: Daniel, Samuel, 1562-1619.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Nicholas Okes, dwelling in Foster-lane for the author. Cum priuilegio,

notesStmt.note: The author's name, Samuel Daniel, appears on B1r.
A completion of his "The first part of the historie of England".
With a preliminary privilege leaf dated 11 March 1618; the last leaf is blank.
Variant: with an additional preliminary bifolium, signed "[par.]", one leaf with a dedication to the Queen, the other blank. For a discussion of this see "The Library", ser.6, vol.4 (1982), p. 62-64.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
